definitions.definition: To harrow with a disc harrow .
To move towards, or operate at, zero blade pitch , orienting the propeller blades face-on to the oncoming airflow and maximizing the drag generated by the propeller.
examples: In the air, the asymmetric drag generated by a discing propeller can result in loss of control of the airplane.

main_definition: ( agriculture ) To harrow with a disc harrow .
secondary_definitions: ( aviation , of a propeller ) To move towards, or operate at, zero blade pitch , orienting the propeller blades face-on to the oncoming airflow and maximizing the drag generated by the propeller.
